name: Petri Sphere
description:
So far, there are two game modes:

  • In Mass Race, your goal is to get as many balls as you can within 2 minutes
  • In Thousand, you need to grow the population to 1,000 balls ASAP while the evil droid is trying to hinder

Rule your army with a laser pointer in your right hand. Absorb white balls first and avoid the others. Thus, you will grow your population, charge a multigun and get fuel for acceleration

For effective growth accelerate with the right trigger. Acceleration fuel recharges during the time. Absorb blue cubes to speed up recharging.

If multigun is charged use it with the left trigger. Switch firing modes with the left grip. Multigun has two modes:

  • Bazooka destroys the enemy’s balls 
  • Freezer creates obstacles 

Absorb the enemy’s balls if your population is larger than theirs. Absorb the entire enemy to get additional fuel for acceleration and charge you multigun.

Teleport on blue platforms with the left teleport button to achieve a better viewpoint.

Open the menu with the right menu button or B button.
